body:
We're currently pushing out a little onto the social media scene!

Expect some social media competitions and sneak peaks on Twitter and Facebook soon, so why miss out?
 
Drop a like at www.facebook.com/AvicusNetwork and follow us on https://twitter.com/avicusnetwork to not miss a thing!

Big thanks! 

apricot

title: Social Media!
